ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Useful if you're at all interested in going beyond national histories. I would recommend it wholeheartedly.
This was an excellent course that I would recommend to anyone interested in transnational and/or international relations.

I would recommend the course particularly because we were able to write our own lecture. I found this experience incredibly generative, and hope to continue to write lectures in the future, before the pressures of teaching.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Writing a lecture was central to also being able to distill my ideas for my diss. research into a manageable form. Further, conversations with Professor Van Vleck allowed me to develop my research.
